articles.content:
Greetings to Swedish King 
    Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Carl Gustaf, king of Sweden, on its national day.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the king and the people of Sweden and wholeheartedly wished Sweden prosperity.

articles.title: Surprise Demonstration against Troop Dispatch
Anti-U.S. Death-defying Resistance Called for
articles.content:
Surprise Demonstration against Troop Dispatch 
    Pyongyang, June 7 (KCNA) -- Students under the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils staged a surprise demonstration against troop dispatch to Iraq in front of the U.S. embassy on June 4, according to south Korean KBS.
 They scattered leaflets which said: "The peace-loving Korean nation cannot join the U.S. in its brutal war of aggression and the 17th National Assembly should get rid of the pressure to send troops."
